title.narrative: Gender Responsive Recovery for Sustainable Peace (GRRSP)

description.narrative: The project will provide increased access of conflict affected women to psycho-social services; Increased community awareness on issues of GBV, human rights, including workers’rights and gender equality; Enhanced capacity of conflict affected women on organizational, leadership and social harmonization; Improved knowledge and skills of conflict affected women and their families for improving agricultural productivity; Enhanced technical and entrepreneurial skills of conflict affected women and their families; Increased capacity of local bodies and concerned service delivery agencies for gender responsive planning and implementation mechanisms. Key Activities will include: provision of psycho-social support; capacity development of LPCs and GEWG; public awareness on gender issues; development of agricultural technical know-how and skills for target groups; implementation of FFS; establishment of local resource centers; development of entrepreneurial and vocational skills of target group; facilitation of linkages with local bodies, technical and business service providers and LPCs; sensitization and training for local bodies and service providers on gender responsive planning and implementation mechanisms.
